jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.agents

Class HumanAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.agents.AbstractAgent
      • jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.agents.HumanAgent

  • public class HumanAgent
extends AbstractAgent
    An 'agent' meant to be controlled by a human. Used to play the game and demonstrate the GUI.
    Author:
    Marc G. Bellemare

      • exportFrames

        Whether we want to export screen data to disk

      • exportFrameBasename

        protected java.lang.String exportFrameBasename
        The base filename used for exporting screen data. The files will be name sequentially, e.g. frame_000000.png, frame_000001.png, etc.

        MovieGenerator
